statements: SELECT * FROM low_stock_alerts
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE current_stock < low_stock_threshold
SELECT id, alert_email FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE current_stock < low_stock_threshold ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, alert_email FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE current_stock < 10
SELECT id, product_name FROM low_stock_alerts ORDER BY current_stock ASC
SELECT * FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE current_stock < low_stock_threshold ORDER BY current_stock ASC, product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, alert_email FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE current_stock < 10 AND alert_email <> 'example@email.com'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS low_stock_count FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE current_stock < low_stock_threshold GROUP BY alert_email HAVING low_stock_count > 2
SELECT * FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE current_stock BETWEEN 5 AND 20 AND product_name LIKE '%example%'
SELECT product_name, SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock FROM low_stock_alerts GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_stock > 50 ORDER BY total_stock DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE stock_level > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT inventory.product_id,inventory.product_name,alerts.alert_type FROM inventory JOIN alerts ON inventory.product_id = alerts.product_id WHERE alerts.alert_type = 'Low Stock';
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type LIKE '%Expiry%';
SELECT inventory.product_name, alerts.alert_message FROM inventory LEFT JOIN alerts ON inventory.product_id = alerts.product_id;
SELECT * FROM low_stock_alerts;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT product_name, alert_time FROM low_stock_alerts JOIN alert_logs ON low_stock_alerts.product_id = alert_logs.product_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE stock_level BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT username, email, alert_time FROM users INNER JOIN alert_logs ON users.user_id = alert_logs.product_id;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, product_name FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE stock_level > 20 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT alert_id, product_id, threshold FROM alerts WHERE threshold < 50 ORDER BY alert_id ASC;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, message FROM notifications WHERE notification_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;

SELECT u.username, n.message, a.stock_level FROM users u INNER JOIN notifications n ON u.user_id = n.user_id INNER JOIN alerts a ON n.alert_id = a.alert_id WHERE u.username LIKE '%john%' AND a.stock_level < a.threshold;
SELECT p.product_name, SUM(a.stock_level) AS total_stock FROM products p LEFT JOIN alerts a ON p.product_id = a.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name HAVING total_stock > 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY user_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM products
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users
SELECT notification_id, notification_time FROM notifications
SELECT alert_id, product_id, alert_type, threshold FROM alerts
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE threshold > 100 ORDER BY alert_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM products WHERE current_stock < max_stock LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT notification_id, alert_id, user_id, notification_time FROM notifications WHERE notification_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE log_time > '2022-03-01' AND log_message LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY log_time ASC;
